mapper.sql: id, url, orderNum, parentId, number, longNumber, name, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, description, modelId, bizModelName
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mubs_resource ( id, url, orderNum, parentId, number, longNumber, name, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, description, modelId, bizModelName ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{url}, #{orderNum}, #{parentId}, #{number}, #{longNumber}, #{name}, #{creator}, #{createDate}, #{lastModifier}, #{lastModDate}, #{description}, #{modelId}, #{bizModelName} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE mubs_resource
url = #{url},
orderNum = #{orderNum},
parentId = #{parentId},
number = #{number},
longNumber = #{longNumber},
name = #{name},
creator = #{creator},
createDate = #{createDate},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
description = #{description},
modelId = #{modelId},
bizModelName = #{bizModelName},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE mubs_resource
url = #{map.url},
orderNum = #{map.orderNum},
parentId = #{map.parentId},
number = #{map.number},
longNumber = #{map.longNumber},
name = #{map.name},
creator = #{map.creator},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
description = #{map.description},
modelId = #{map.modelId},
bizModelName = #{map.bizModelName},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mubs_resource ( id, url, orderNum, parentId, number, longNumber, name, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, description, modelId, bizModelName ) VALUES ( #{map.id}, #{map.url}, #{map.orderNum}, #{map.parentId}, #{map.number}, #{map.longNumber}, #{map.name}, #{map.creator}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.lastModifier}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.description}, #{map.modelId}, #{map.bizModelName} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM mubs_resource
and id in (#{condition.whereSql})
limit ${offset}, ${rows}

SELECT
FROM mubs_resource
AND id like '%#{id}%'
AND url like '%#{url}%'
AND orderNum like '%#{orderNum}%'
AND parentId like '%#{parentId}%'
AND number like '%#{number}%'
AND longNumber like '%#{longNumber}%'
AND name like '%#{name}%'
AND creator like '%#{creator}%'
AND createDate like '%#{createDate}%'
AND lastModifier like '%#{lastModifier}%'
AND lastModDate like '%#{lastModDate}%'
AND description like '%#{description}%'
AND modelId like '%#{modelId}%'
AND bizModelName like '%#{bizModelName}%'
